phrases.phrase: Wealth does not consist in having great possessions, but in having few needs.
phrases.author: Cicero

phrases.phrase: Frugality includes all of the other virtues.
phrases.author: Epicteto

phrases.phrase: The poor man is not the man who has little, but the man who longs for more.
phrases.author: SÃªneca

phrases.phrase: I'd like to live like a poor man with a lot of money.
phrases.author: Pablo Picasso

phrases.phrase: Money is useless unless you know its value from experience.
phrases.author: P.T. Barnum

phrases.phrase: Many people spend money they haven't earned to buy things they don't want, to impress people they don't like.
phrases.author: Will Rogers

phrases.phrase: Money has never made man happy, nor will it. There is nothing in its nature that produces happiness. The more you have, the more you want.
phrases.author: Benjamin Franklin

phrases.phrase: Happiness does not lie in the mere possession of money, but in the joy of fulfillment, in the thrill of creative effort.
phrases.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

phrases.phrase: Money doesn't create success, but the freedom to create success does.
phrases.author: Nelson Mandela

phrases.phrase: The opportunity is missed by most people because it comes dressed in overalls and looks like work.
phrases.author: Thomas Edison

phrases.phrase: Never spend your money before you've earned it.
phrases.author: Thomas Jefferson

phrases.phrase: Money passes from those who don't manage it to those who do.
phrases.author: Dave Ramsey

phrases.phrase: We become what we think about.
phrases.author: Earl Nightingale
